module:
Module-level comment: 
The Altera_UP_I2C_AV_Auto_Initialize module automates the initialization of the I2C interface for an audio-visual system operating on Altera chipsets. The functionality is achieved via a finite state machine (FSM) with distinct states for managing different aspects of I2C initialization. Inputs 'clk', 'reset', 'clear_error', 'ack', 'transfer_complete', and outputs like 'data_out', 'transfer_data', 'send_start_bit', 'send_stop_bit', 'auto_init_complete', 'auto_init_error' facilitate this process. Internal counters and registers maintain ROM data and states of FSM. A careful synchronization of these elements controls the I2C communication setup.
